commands.name: az connectedvmware virtual-network create
examples: az connectedvmware virtual-network create --custom-location "custom location name"                --location "location name" --inventory-item "name or id the inventory item"                --name "virtual network name" --resource-group "resource group name"                --vcenter "name or id of the vcenter"

commands.name: az connectedvmware virtual-network delete
examples: az connectedvmware virtual-network delete --ids "resource id" --name "virtual network name"                --resource-group "resource group name" --subscription "Name or ID of subscription"

commands.name: az connectedvmware virtual-network list
commands.summary: Retrieve a list of virtual network of given resource group.
examples: az connectedvmware virtual-network list --resource-group "resource group name"

commands.name: az connectedvmware virtual-network show
commands.summary: Get details of a virtual network by id, resource-group, reource pool name or subscription.
examples: az connectedvmware virtual-network show --ids "resource id" --name "virtual network name"                --resource-group "resource group name" --subscription "Name or ID of subscription"
